Articles.Content: When i try to save the game,  when i restart the game,  I don't see the  last save. Also tried to cancel old saves but nothing.

I am about to make my own bug report. But I experienced the same this morning. temporarily. It disappeared and then reappeared.

But my main problem is that ships are not saveable. And because the ships disappear the saves are messed up and sometimes I cant save at all. The game somehow itself erases my ships from the workspaces folder.. And that interacts with the save game command too.




 

Edited February 28, 2023 by Ligator
